      • getCity

        public City getCity()
        This method gets the City of this Customer. It calls the AbstractFabric.getById(int) with the idCity .
        Returns:
        The City of the Customer.

      • getReservations

        public java.util.List<Reservation> getReservations()
        This method gets the List of Reservation of this Customer. It calls the ReservationFabric.getReservationsOf(Customer) with this.
        Returns:
        The List of Reservation of this Customer.
